item.title: [P.I]How to Disable idle[P.I]
item.dc:creator: @RuneScape_Remake RuneScape Remake
item.description:
@RuneScape_Remake wrote:

how can i disable idle so people dont log out?

Heres the Fix:

Go to IdleLogout.java Replace it all with this code

[code]package server.model.players.packets;

import server.model.players.Client;
import server.model.players.PacketType;

public class IdleLogout implements PacketType {

@Override
public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
	//c.logout();
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
